Posts.EditableText:
My interpreter "geas" for Quest games is close to ready.

Current program is C++ with Gtk-- toolkit and is compiled for Linux.

I'm really look for
 - anybody who can compile C++ / Gtk-- for Mac or Windows
 - anybody willing to test Geas against the Quest runner on Beam

There is a possible Glk port of the interface in the works for
Spatterlight / Gargogyle.
Posts.HTML:

Posts.EditableText: Geas doesn't support !include yet.  If you want to use a library, you'll have to compile the game.
Posts.HTML: Geas doesn't support !include yet.  If you want to use a library, you'll have to compile the game.

Posts.EditableText: Got it.  It's a bug in the way it prints status variables.  I'm fixing it now, but as a workaround, make sure the last line of any variable definition block is a "display < ... >" type line.
Posts.HTML: Got it.  It's a bug in the way it prints status variables.  I'm fixing it now, but as a workaround, make sure the last line of any variable definition block is a "display < ... >" type line.
